title: H.E. William Benjamin Mkapa | Tanzania Academy of Sciences (TAAS)

quotes: The late Mkapa, in 1996, created a Presidential Commission to investigate corruption in the country under the leadership of the retired Prime minister, Hon. Joseph Sinde Warioba.

organizations.name: Presidential Commission
quotes: The late Mkapa, in 1996, created a Presidential Commission to investigate corruption in the country under the leadership of the retired Prime minister, Hon. Joseph Sinde Warioba.

organizations.name: Anti-Corruption Institution
quotes: The outcome of the Commission did, to a great extent, re-enforced the war against corruption in the country leading to the creation of the Anti-Corruption Institution in the country.

organizations.name: National Business Council – NBC
quotes: He introduced a system of dialogue between the Government and the Private Sector where he personally oversaw through the National Business Council – NBC.

roles.title: President
quotes: After his presidential ascendancy, he vigorously began to adjust the economy by introducing reforms in the Government in order to solve the challenges which prevailed then.

roles.title: retired Prime minister
quotes: The late Mkapa, in 1996, created a Presidential Commission to investigate corruption in the country under the leadership of the retired Prime minister, Hon. Joseph Sinde Warioba.
He established very good rapport at international level which enabled Tanzania to get unflinching support from the world over including that of big nations like China and Russia.

The late Benjamin William Mkapa was highly respected in Southern African countries for his grand contributions he made during the liberation struggle under the leadership of Mwalimu Julius Kambarage Nyerere.

supporting_quotes: The late Mkapa, in 1996, created a Presidential Commission to investigate corruption in the country under the leadership of the retired Prime minister, Hon. Joseph Sinde Warioba.
assembled_events.notes: Direct linkage between time marker, organization, and role in the same quote.

supporting_quotes: After his presidential ascendancy, he vigorously began to adjust the economy by introducing reforms in the Government in order to solve the challenges which prevailed then.
He introduced a system of dialogue between the Government and the Private Sector where he personally oversaw through the National Business Council – NBC.
assembled_events.notes: No explicit time marker, but role and organization are clearly linked through the President's actions in Tanzania.
